Guerlain Abeille Royale, INTENSE CLEANSING OIL

Brand: Guerlain

Category: Facial Cleanser

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ISONONYL ISONONANOATE, PEG-20 GLYCERYL TRIISOSTEARATE, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE, SQUALANE, ROYAL JELLY, MEL (HONEY), CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, PHYTOSTEROLS
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
